subject: Advertising and Marketing
Automobile Racing
Athletics and Sports
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: No other major sport uses its athletes as much as Nascar does, but, then, no other sport is as linked to its sponsors as Nascar is.
snippet: No other major sport uses its athletes as much as Nascar does, but, then, no other sport is as linked to its sponsors as Nascar is.
